availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Solomon S. Robinson (Chillicothe, Ohio, carpenter and soldier.)

body.p: Chillicothe, Ohio, carpenter and soldier. Chillicothe, Ohio, native. Son of John Robinson and Catharine Robinson. Married to Mariah M. Keepers Robinson in Franklin County, Ohio on March 23, 1852. Carpenter in Ross County in 1850. Carpenter in Ross County in 1860. Served in the 22nd Ohio Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a captain from April 21, 1861 to May 14, 1861. Served in the 16th U.S. Infantry Regiment as a captain from May 14, 1861 to January 15, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Ross County, Chillicothe, p. 59A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Ross County, Chillicothe, p. 84.
Eleventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1890), Veterans Schedule, Missouri, Greene County, Campbell.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Franklin County Marriages, Film 000285143, p. 368.
